div.p: In this highly visible role, you will be at the center of a multimedia IP design effort interfacing with all disciplines, with a critical impact on getting functional products to millions of customers quickly.

ul.li: The ideal candidate will have 5+ years of experience in multimedia IP/SoC design
• Previous experience in control centric, high performance high throughput designs with deep pipelines and complex flow and data structures, especially with multimedia applications
• Good understanding of system and fabric interface, arbitration, buffer/queue sizing and management, and bandwidth or throughput performance analysis
• Familiar with common on-chip bus protocols such as AMBA (AXI, AHB, APB)
• Experience in frontend implementation tasks such as synthesis, sta, logic equivalence
• Industry exposure to and knowledge of ASIC/FPGA design methodology

div.p: As a senior IP Design engineer you will have responsibilities spanning all aspects of multimedia IP design • Collaborate with platform architecture team to define, analyze, and document micro-architecture specifications • Perform feasibility analysis on suggested architecture(s) and algorithm(s) • Perform RTL design and logic implementation of agreed architecture • Perform front end implementation tasks such as synthesis, logic equivalence check, STA
